name: Belowworld
description:
Your mission is simple, travel to the belowworld and destroy the Cyberbrain. On the way you will encounter deadly insectoids and other hazards. Use your laser blaster to take out enemies and obstacles in this platforming underground adventure. 

Note: You may encounter some strange glitches, if you do or if you become stuck press the R key to force retry to the last checkpoint you activated. If you have trouble getting down a ladder just wiggle a little or jump down the hole and you should descend properly.

CONTROLS

Z to Jump

X to Fire

R Key to Force Restart

Arrow Keys to Move

This game has Gamepad support! 

Made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5+ for the Untitled Game Jam
